title: Panel, ca. 1600
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: grid of withdrawn element with needle lace, reticella style;
creditline: Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf Esq. in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Small oblong panel of needle lace (reticella). Designs arranged in squares in three rows depicting people, boats, etc. Probably Biblical and contains one episode of Judith and Holofernes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, ca. 1600.
ca. 1600. Medium: linen
Technique: grid of withdrawn element with needle lace, reticella style;. Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf Esq. in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1950-121-27-b.
